Operation 'list' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_context, missing_output_details. Description is completely empty, making it impossible for AI agents to understand filtering capabilities, pagination support, or expected response structure. Added details about parameters, response format, and required inputs for better interpretability.

data.current_summary: Retrieve a list of Subscriptions for the specified Shopper
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves all subscriptions for the specified Shopper. Supports filtering, sorting, and pagination through query parameters. Returns a SubscriptionList containing an array of Subscription objects with full details including billing information, products, and addons.
